resp = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "is_published": True
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="2",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "is_published": False
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    aggs={
        "publish_state": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "is_published"
            }
        }
    },
    sort=[
        "is_published"
    ],
    fields=[
        {
            "field": "weight"
        }
    ],
    runtime_mappings={
        "weight": {
            "type": "long",
            "script": "emit(doc['is_published'].value ? 10 : 0)"
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
